key.name: mbmd-url
key.description: The URL to use for MBMD connection.

key.name: mbm-request-delay
key.summary: Delay between two requests to mbmd api (in seconds).

key.name: mbm-max-solar-power
key.summary: How much solar power is generated at maximum (in W).

key.name: mbm-max-grid-power
key.summary: What is grid maximum usage, before you pay penalties (in W).
